extendedInfo.description: Dungeon Raid is going to challenge your strategy skills to the max! Trace a path and match the tiles to collect treasure, buy and upgrade weapons and defeat monsters in this exciting and addictive puzzle roleplaying game. Things happen fast in Dungeon Raid, so gather your courage and dive in!"Dungeon Raid is an effortless recommendation... download this game now."- TouchArcade"Pick this one up. For its price, they definitely made me feel like it was well worth the money in so many ways"- appSafari"If youâre looking for a different type of match 3 game or youâre an RPG nut that wants to get a quick fix every now and again, Dungeon Raid is just the game for you"- TouchMyApps"Dungeon Raid manages to capture the essence of both rogue like dungeon crawling, and addictive match 3 in a easily accessible formula"- TouchGen"Itâs a fun mix of match-three puzzling and role-playing"- Pocket GamerDungeon Raid is a puzzle RPG, a blend of puzzle game with roleplaying mechanics. Your mission is to trace a path through a set of matching tiles, but watch out â you may be attacked by enemies who improve as fast as you do.As you go, the object is to collect as many resources as you can, like gold and experience. Get enough points and you can buy or upgrade equipment and level up. All the while, remember to avoid those nasty enemy skull tiles and fight them off for as long as you possibly can. And don't get too greedy, or you risk being overwhelmed!The higher you go in a Dungeon Raid game, the more strategy youâre going to need to match a greater number of tiles, grab bonuses and stay ahead of those evil adversaries. Never forget that they improve as the game continues.Keep your wits about you as you play Dungeon Raid. As you level up, there are many trade offs to consider and complimentary combinations of skills to be chosen. If youâre not used to the tense pace of the higher levels, go ahead and start on easy difficulty. That gives you the chance to play the game in a more relaxed way, and watch how powerful your avatar can become.Regardless of your skill level, youâll never get bored with Dungeon Raid because thereâs so much going on! There are hundreds of items to collect, a growing list of character skills and many different strategies for you to use. Youâll be itching to play just one more turn, just one more game for hours and days on end.Features:â 4 difficulty levels: select a relaxing easy game or go for a challenging and strategic experienceâ 2 challenge modesâ 400+ unique items to buy and upgradeâ 77 achievements to unlockâ 40 diverse abilities to help you and hinder your enemiesâ 30 special monsters to defeatâ 20 powerful upgrades to apply to your itemsâ 10 character classes to unlock & customiseâ Level up and improve your avatar as you kill enemies and collect experience pointsâ Global leaderboards using Game Center & OpenFeintâ Play your own music during the game â Constant save system: quit the game and return to it at any time

reviews.title: Galaxy s 3 one of the best....
reviews.comment: One of the best buys from google play, worth every penny. Recommend buy!!
reviews.author: julius Pennington

reviews.title: Excellent puzzle rpg
reviews.comment: One of the best puzzle RPG hybrids I have ever played. Recommend that everyone try out this wonderful game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I just keep coming back
reviews.comment: Very enjoyable game. Lots of possibilities and good incentive to push further and try to beat our own high scores. Underneath a simple concept lies a deep gaming experience.
reviews.author: Olivier Zanchetta

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Simple, fun, and addictive fast-paced game with many options and good presentation.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Keep coming back
reviews.comment: Every game library needs that game that\'s perfect for a few minutes of play while waiting for... whatever! I have a lot of games on my phone, but this is the one I keep coming back to: hard to give it higher praise.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Fantastic game, incredibly addictive, simple and surprisingly deep! Must buy!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: love it!!!
reviews.comment: I missed this game the most when i left iphone.  SO glad to have this app on android. dont like the fact that the app is paid app but it is a definitely regretlesssssssss app.
reviews.author: jin you

reviews.title: Hours of fun
reviews.comment: Loving this game. If you like tile match games you will enjoy this game.
reviews.author: Zane McNab

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: Wonderful! The only improvement I would suggest is some sort of system to know when you\'re going to level up a class or gain a new one.
reviews.author: Jason Joyce

reviews.title: Meh...
reviews.comment: First game I wish I could get a refund for. I\'ve played 3 times, but each time the game overwhelms you at level 4. Lame. Run away!
reviews.author: Andrew Dickerhoof

reviews.title: Awesome combat mechanics.
reviews.comment: There\'s not a whole lot of rpg in this puzzle hybrid.  it\'s more of an arcade style experience, where you try to last as long as you can on one quarter.  The drops are random, but you have just enough influence over them that you can build a player to your style.  If it hits on all cylinders, it\'s worth three bucks.  If you didn\'t like puzzle quest, wait for a sale.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun geometry casual
reviews.comment: Nice variety in powers and character choice. I love the random ExcusePlot backstories too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The addiction is juat too much...
reviews.comment: This game just keeps taunting me to go back and I do, time and time again. The only thing I have failed so far to understand is how you actually raise the multiple classes levels. It just seems to happen on its own accord.
reviews.author: Antonio Russo

reviews.title: Flippin addicting!!
reviews.comment: One of the simplest games that is also so easy to play and love! Great game!
reviews.author: Christopher Eaton

reviews.title: Just Plain Fun
reviews.comment: Stellar game that\'s actually a challenge. Its tough because of random upgrades but worth the time and money. Bravo.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent game at a great price!
reviews.comment: This game is so addictive it\'s unbelievable. It\'s a match 3 puzzle/RPG with great replay value. Would definitely recommend this game
reviews.author: Conrad Daly

reviews.title: Really excellent.
reviews.comment: A complete deal for the price.  If you liked Puzzle Quest, you\'ll love this.
reviews.author: Ryan Bixby

reviews.title: The Puzzle Quest beater!
reviews.comment: This match-3 game (or as many as you can!), manages to pack a lot of punch from within it\'s Rogue-like/RPG depths, and satisfies on all counts. Simply an amazingly addictive game that gets better with each play through. Puzzle Quest has some catching up to do with Dungeon Raid\'s \303\274ber skulls!!! -as stated in other reviews, this game is quite a serious battery-eater, but it\'s still essential!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Nexus
reviews.comment: It is hard to explain how the game actually plays but this is a must have and needs to be experienced to be understood. Watch the time the fly by.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Excellent time sink. Not boring, but neither so taking you can\'t pick it up for a few quick rounds, anytime.
reviews.author: A Google User
